"[Private Lobbies] and [Shared Lobbies]": "[Private Lobbies] and [Shared Lobbies]  A Private Lobby is a block that can only be logged in only through a single platform.  For Private Lobbies, there are \"PC\" Private Lobbies and \"PS Vita\" Private Lobbies, and can only be logged in by users through the specified platform used.  For Shared Lobbies, both \"PC\" and \"PS Vita\" users can enter it."
